body_html:
You can use a py_func inside your input_fn. There's lots of downsides to using a py_func, but in this case you probably don't care much. Would that work for you?

I don't think we want to add more arguments to the signature of fit.
body_text:
You can use a py_func inside your input_fn. There's lots of downsides to using a py_func, but in this case you probably don't care much. Would that work for you?
I don't think we want to add more arguments to the signature of fit.
body:
You can use a `py_func` inside your input_fn. There's lots of downsides to using a `py_func`, but in this case you probably don't care much. Would that work for you?

I don't think we want to add more arguments to the signature of fit.
